import axios from "axios"; import { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import config from "../../Config/config"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import time from "../../TimeFunctions"; export default function ImageViewer(props) { const data = props.match.params.number; const [imageInfo, setImageInfo] = useState(""); const [userName, setUserName] = useState(""); const [updater, setUpdater] = useState(true); useEffect(() => { axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}imageinfo`, { _id: data }) .then((res) => setImageInfo(res.data)) .then(()=>{ imageInfo.likedBy.map((email)=>{ email?( setUpdater(false) ):null })}) }, [updater]); useEffect(() => { const id = localStorage.getItem("email"); axios.post(`${config.backendUrl}userdata`, { email: id }).then((res) => { setUserName(res.data.fname + " " + res.data.lname); }); }, []); function handleLike(event) { event.email = localStorage.getItem('email'); if (updater === true) { axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}likes`, event) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .then(() => setUpdater(!updater)); } else { axios .post(`${config.backendUrl}dislikes`, event) .then((res) => console.log(res.data)) .then(() => setUpdater(!updater)); } } return (
